greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Filter sequence combining from all proper divisors d of n, the prime signature of 2d+1.
comment: Restricted growth sequence transform of A305982.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..65537
program: rgs_transform(invec) = { my(om = Map(), outvec = vector(length(invec)), u=1); for(i=1, length(invec), if(mapisdefined(om,invec[i]), my(pp = mapget(om, invec[i])); outvec[i] = outvec[pp] , mapput(om,invec[i],i); outvec[i] = u; u++ )); outvec; };
A305982(n) = { my(m=1); fordiv(n, d, if((d<n), m *= prime(A305973(1+d)-1))); (m); }; \\ Needs also code from A305973.
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Jun 15 2018
